metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5147 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The libtremor library has the same flaw as CVE-2018-5146. This library is used by Firefox in place of libvorbis on Android and ARM platforms. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.7.2 and Firefox < 59.0.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5147` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbisidec1 - 1.0.2+svn18153-0.2+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libvorbisidec package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2+svn18153-0.2+deb7u1build0.14.04.1').
